Desc.entry: A registered charity that helps the Somali population in Sheffield to access mental health services provided by the voluntary and statutory sectors. Trained staff provide basic counselling and assistance with everyday life, help and advice on benefits, advocacy, interpreting, and floating support. The service also provides support for people in hospital, social care and housing advice. Self or any referral. Company limited by guarantee no 6639255.
